name: Help Meowt!
description:
Adventure through the quirky, colourful streets in town, collecting stray cats as you go! Use your charisma (and treats) to gain their trust and take them to safety, whilst also taking photographs of your new furry friends to share!

This game was created as a submission for the GJL Game Parade, Fall 2021. Over 7 days we developed this game with a team of four 3D artists and one programmer. View our portfolios below, and of course play the game and let us know what you think!

Our programmer:

James Smale

https://www.jamessmale.info/
